original_text: And it came to pass about this time, that Joseph went into the house to do his business; and there was none of the men of the house there within.
korean_text: 그러할 때에 요셉이 그의 일을 하러 그 집에 들어갔더니 그 집 사람들은 하나도 거기에 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass about this time
that Joseph went into the house
and there was none of the men of the house there within
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 집 안에는 집 남자들이 아무도 없었다
